sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Navbar() { const handleSelectLanguage = (event)=>{ setLanguage(event.target.textContent) } const [language , setLanguage]= useState("Select Language to translate to from English") return (
Language Translator {/*
  • {language}
    • Spanish
    • French
    • German
    • Chinese
    • Japanese
*/}
) }
